channel.title: Error when running server exception...outofbounds... 17 HELP!
channel.description:
this is the error I get when I run my server
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 17 at itemhandler.loaditemlist<itemhandler.java:273> at itemhandler.<init><itemhandler.java:232> at server.main<server.java:118>
this happened after I changed prices around in the "items.cfg" file. and changed them around in the "shops.cfg" for assault shop. I compiled and ran and this is what I got... Im not sure what I did... PLEASE HELP!!! :(

item.title: Error when running server exception...outofbounds... 17 HELP!
item.dc:creator: @EscapeTheF8 EscapeTheF8
item.description:
@EscapeTheF8 wrote:

this is the error I get when I run my server

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.arrayindexoutofboundsexception: 17
at itemhandler.loaditemlistitemhandler.java:273
at itemhandler.itemhandler.java:232
at server.mainserver.java:118

this happened after I changed prices around in the “items.cfg” file.
and changed them around in the “shops.cfg” for assault shop.
I compiled and ran and this is what I got… Im not sure what I did…
PLEASE HELP!!!
